title: (x) Michigan State typeface - Serpentine {Hrant}
content:
I'm back. Looking for yet another athletic typeface. Anybody ever seen anything like this:   
   
 ![msu-logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824091204im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1956.gif)
author: graficartist

comments.content:
I got it! It's a basketball player.   
   
Seriously: I think it might be Serpentine (yet again).   
   
hhp

really? I don't know why I didn't think of that. I see that face everywhere. Now that I mention it I think you're right. Thanks Hrant.   
   
Tom
More sports related type...i thought we had this talk before.

I can't help it. I work for an athletic wear company. As they say in Japan:   
Shikata ga nai~   
   
Tom
